entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries near noon. Fog dissipating this afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow or rain. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow or freezing rain ending near midnight then 70 percent chance of rain showers late this evening and after midnight. Wind south 20 km/h. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Thursday 12 January 2023
